laboratory_examinations.findings: There is extensive diverticulosis of the entire colon. There is focal fat stranding and bowel wall thickening of distal portion of the descending colon consistent with a small intramural abscess measuring approximately 1.0 x 0.7 cm. No evidence of perforation or fistula.
MIXED BACTERIAL FLORA (>= 3 COLONY TYPES), CONSISTENT WITH SKIN AND/OR GENITAL CONTAMINATION.
